txt.en: You have turned in a stack of trophies for a modest reward suitable for a collector such as yourself.
Wanted: Heavy carapaces from the twisted creatures of nature in Agamaur. Bring them to Elsa the Bold at the Eglain-camp in Agamaur.
'These will be used to reinforce our armour so that we may stand a little longer against the evil spreading here.\n\n'Thank you.'
'There are few supplies, and we dare not leave the pass unguarded. To make repairs, we must follow our ways. Can you help?'
Elsa the Bold, at the Eglain-camp in Agamaur, desires heavy carapaces from the twisted creatures of nature found in Agamaur.
Deliver the heavy carapaces to Elsa the Bold at the Eglain-camp at Agamaur
You accepted a task from Elsa the Bold to acquire heavy carapaces from the creatures of nature within the swamp south of Agamaur. You can find Elsa the Bold within the Eglain-camp in Agamaur.
Wanted: Heavy carapaces from the twisted creatures of nature in Agamaur.
